page.title: 16HOME LIFE - QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: Within the Ballifield Middle School area the questionnaires revealed the following information about items used by local families:- 61% of households have 1 car 7% of households have 2 cars 2% of households have 3 cars 30% of households do not have a car. 64% of households own pets. Fish, dogs and cats were the most popular. 23% of families have 1 t.v. set 56% of families have 2 t.v. sets 17% of families have 3 t.v. sets 3% of families have 4 t.v. sets and 1% of families have 5 t.v. sets. 54% own a video recorder; 88% own a stereo system; 48% own a computer; 90% have a washing machine; 34% have a tumble dryer; 99% have a fridge; 22% have a food processor; l8% have a microwave oven. None of the families questioned owned a dishwasher.
